file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-23-08-04 - STERILE LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STERILE LIGHT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH STERILE LIGHT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the sterile light assembly and its lamp. B. The sterile light assembly is installed at the header panel, on the cockpit/cabin partition. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH STERILE LIGHT ASSEMBLY AND LAMP - 33-23-08-000-801-A STERILE LIGHT REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH STERILE LIGHT ASSEMBLY AND LAMP - 33-23-08-400-801-A STERILE LIGHT INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-23-08 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-08-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH STERILE LIGHT 2. STERILE LIGHT ASSEMBLY AND LAMP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the sterile light assembly and its lamp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-12-01-000-801-A/400 COCKPIT LINING - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit/cabin partition I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the sterile light switch, on the overhead panel, is in the OFF position. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disengage and remove the sterile light assembly lens. (2) Disengage and remove the lamp from the holder (2) (integral with the sterile light assembly lens). NOTE: If the removal of the sterile light assembly is necessary, remove the center headliner panel ( AMM TASK 25-12-01-000-801-A/400) and do as follows: (3) Undo the wiring electrical connections (10). (4) Loosen the nut (9) which attaches the sterile light assembly to the attachment support (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-08 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Release the threaded socket (7) from the lens support (4). (6) Pull out the threaded socket (7) to remove it from the attachment support (5). (7) Remove the attachment support (6) and lens support (4) from the panel (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-08 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH STERILE LIGHT Sterile Light Assembly and Lamp - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE 231 A B 10. SPLICE DET. A 9. NUT 8. LOCK WASHER 1. LAMP 7. THREADED SOCKET 2. LAMP HOLDER 6. ATTACHMENT SUPPORT 5. HEADER PANEL 4. LENS SUPPORT DET. B 3. LENS 145AMM330124.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-08 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. COURTESY LTS

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-08-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH STERILE LIGHT 3. STERILE LIGHT ASSEMBLY AND LAMP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the sterile light assembly and its lamp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE AMM TASK 25-12-01-400-801-A/400 COCKPIT LINING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit/cabin partition I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) If applicable, put in position and fit the lens support (4) into the panel (5). (2) Pass the threaded socket (7) through the attachment support (6) hole. (3) Put the attachment support (6) in position and screw the threaded socket (7) into the lens support (4). (4) Tighten the nut (9) which attaches the sterile light assembly to the header panel. (5) Make the wiring electrical connections (10). (6) Put in position and fit the lamp (1) into the lamp holder (2) (integral with the sterile light assembly lens). (7) Put in position and fit the lens (3) into the lens support (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-23-08 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Energize the aircraft with the external DC power supply ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). (2) Do the sterile light lamp test as follows: (a) On the overhead panel, set the sterile light switch to the ON position. Result: 1 The sterile light lamp comes on. (3) Install the center headliner panel ( AMM TASK 25-12-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-23-08 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
